alert.note: Alert for Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 6:00AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee affecting Wilkinson and Washington Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Oconee River at Avant Mine near Oconee. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and wetlands along the river upstream and downstream from a gage located by a dirt boat ramp on the west side of Avant Mine off Adams Road in Washington County. The water level will be at the top of the boat ramp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM EST Saturday was 19.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.5 feet on 12/15/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 600 PM EST.
